item.title: Gaza ceasefire in effect, Israel says, as hostage release countdown begins
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu vows "Hamas will disarm," easy way or the hard way, as Israel's military says a Gaza ceasefire is in effect.

item.title: Consumer confidence remains fragile, new economic survey data shows
item.description: Americans still concerned about persistent inflation and weaker hiring, according to a closely watched consumer confidence gauge.
